Package org.apache.drill.exec.store.dfs

Interface OpenFileTracker

All Known Implementing Classes:
DrillFileSystem
public interface OpenFileTracker
Interface to track opening and closing of files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    fileClosed(DrillFSDataInputStream fsDataInputStream)
    Remove the given DrillFSDataInputStream from opened file list.
    void
    fileOpened(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path, DrillFSDataInputStream fsDataInputStream)
    Add new file location and DrillFSDataInputStream to list.
